amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for any nonrecourse loans to sugar beet or sugar cane processors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 21 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1997, to eliminate the nonrecourse loan program for sugar production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (FL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 253, 1 Present (Roll no. 312).
